description: Gets information about an existing Amazon Q Business application.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon Q Business application.

nested_items.name: applicationId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application.

nested_items.name: applicationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Q Business application.

nested_items.name: identityType
nested_items.description: The authentication type being used by a Amazon Q Business application.

nested_items.name: iamIdentityProviderArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an identity provider being used by an Amazon Q Business application.

nested_items.name: identityCenterApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS IAM Identity Center instance attached to your Amazon Q Business application.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM with permissions to access your CloudWatch logs and metrics.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the Amazon Q Business application.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description for the Amazon Q Business application.

nested_items.name: encryptionConfiguration
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Web Services KMS key that is used to encrypt your data. Amazon Q Business doesn't support asymmetric keys.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the KMS key. Amazon Q Business doesn't support asymmetric keys.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the Amazon Q Business application was last updated.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the Amazon Q Business application was last updated.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The message explaining the Amazon Q Business request error.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The code associated with the Amazon Q Business request error.

nested_items.name: attachmentsConfiguration
nested_items.description: Settings for whether end users can upload files directly during chat.

nested_items.name: attachmentsControlMode
nested_items.description: Information about whether file upload during chat functionality is activated for your application.

nested_items.name: qAppsConfiguration
nested_items.description: Settings for whether end users can create and use Amazon Q Apps in the web experience.

nested_items.name: qAppsControlMode
nested_items.description: Status information about whether end users can create and use Amazon Q Apps in the web experience.

nested_items.name: personalizationConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration information about chat response personalization. For more information, see Personalizing chat responses.

nested_items.name: personalizationControlMode
nested_items.description: An option to allow Amazon Q Business to customize chat responses using user specific metadata--specifically, location and job information--in your IAM Identity Center instance.

nested_items.name: autoSubscriptionConfiguration
nested_items.description: Settings for auto-subscription behavior for this application. This is only applicable to SAML and OIDC applications.

nested_items.name: autoSubscribe
nested_items.description: Describes whether automatic subscriptions are enabled for an Amazon Q Business application using IAM identity federation for user management.

nested_items.name: defaultSubscriptionType
nested_items.description: Describes the default subscription type assigned to an Amazon Q Business application using IAM identity federation for user management. If the value for autoSubscribe is set to ENABLED you must select a value for this field.

nested_items.name: clientIdsForOIDC
nested_items.description: The OIDC client ID for a Amazon Q Business application.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: quickSightConfiguration
nested_items.description: The Amazon QuickSight authentication configuration for the Amazon Q Business application.

nested_items.name: clientNamespace
nested_items.description: The Amazon QuickSight namespace that is used as the identity provider. For more information about QuickSight namespaces, see Namespace operations.
